mean_cn: adj. 语言的，语言上的，语音学的
mean_en: of or relating to language or linguistics
word_etyma: lingu语言 + istic形容词后缀 → linguistic 语言学的
short_phrase: linguistic similarities between English and French
sentence: Spanish, Portuguese, and French all have linguistic similarities.
sentence_trans: 西班牙语、葡萄牙语、法语具有语言上的相似性。
